content.rendered:
NEED CAR SERVICING WITH A COURTESY CAR?

Vaucluse Auto Repairs (VAR Automotive) is one of the few local automotive centres that offer a courtesy vehicle for the duration of repairs.

 
We've got you covered.

If your work and family life mean you require a vehicle, please request a courtesy vehicle at time of booking. We will do our best to ensure there is as little disruption to your normal routine as possible.
